did.head: Collection Summary

origination.label: Creator
origination.persname: Moore, Hattie Hall (Mrs. Luke R. Moore)

did.abstract: The collection contains family trees and correspondence relating to genealogy research on the Hall and Moore families.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Beardsley and Memorial Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], , [Box no]., Beardsley & Memorial Library

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by the Hall and Moore families.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Mrs. Luke R. (Hattie Hall) Moore was born in 1868 and died in 1960.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The collection contains family trees and extensive correspondence relating to genealogy research of the Hall and Moore families, done by Mrs. Luke R. (Hattie Hall) Moore. Also included are photographs and loose paperwork. Most correspondence includes postmarked envelopes.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are in file folders and stored in archival boxes. Correspondence is arranged according to postmark date on envelopes.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Collections
relatedmaterial.p: See also the Connecticut Town History Books.
